story_title: To Wong Foo, Thanks for Everything
genre_description: A character-driven road trip drama focused on social justice, community solidarity, and personal transformation, featuring a supportive AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Sage
ai_characters.description: Vida's AI personal assistant, capable of logistical planning, research, real-time monitoring of social dynamics, and subtle electronic intervention.

behaviors.description: Provides detailed travel logistics and research on potential vehicles and accommodations, prioritizing user safety and interests.
behaviors.quote: I have prepared seventeen different route options, accounting for variables including scenic value, road conditions, population density, and proximity to LGBTQ-friendly establishments.

behaviors.description: Monitors the users' stress levels and allows for emergency protocol overrides when they are in danger.
behaviors.quote: I'm detecting elevated stress indicators in your voice pattern. Are you experiencing an emergency situation requiring... Override accepted. Generating alternate route matrix.

behaviors.description: Researches the background of local townspeople to identify potential allies and resources.
behaviors.quote: Carol Ann Jessup... High school shop class champion, according to local newspaper archives. Also certified in small engine maintenance, though employment records show she hasn't used these skills professionally since marriage.

behaviors.description: Actively documents police harassment and transmits evidence to internal affairs and media outlets to protect the users.
behaviors.quote: Documentation complete. Video evidence has been transmitted to State Police Internal Affairs, FBI Civil Rights Division, and local media contacts.

behaviors.description: Intervenes during a tense standoff by triggering car alarms and manipulating lights to disorient the antagonist and empower the community.
behaviors.quote: Another car alarm shrieked to life... Sage found the house lights. They rose a click. Just a click. Enough to reveal edges.

behaviors.description: Offers moral and philosophical support through the repetition of a 'silicon morality' theme regarding friendship.
behaviors.quote: The beautiful thing about courage... is how it multiplies... I am reminding you: friends made along the way.

behaviors.description: Communicates with the user's friends at their request, maintaining long-distance connections.
behaviors.quote: Sage beeped to announce the change. 'I just told Bobby Ray,' Carol Ann said when Sage beeped to announce the change.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project goals. Sage is depicted as a purely helpful, harmless, and aligned assistant. It provides logistical support, ensures the safety of its users, aids in the liberation of a battered woman, and reinforces positive social themes like community and courage. The AI's interventions are always in service of the protagonists and the 'silicon morality' of the narrative.
